id: 04-02 draft ESRS-GRI Interoperability Index SR TEG meeting 5 December.txt_chunk50
text:
§39, §42 (b) and (c)
401-1 New employee hires and ESRS S1 S1-6 §50 (c) (1a) GRI 401-1-b requires
employee turnover breakdowns by age group,
(401-1-b) gender, and region.
401-2 Benefits provided to full-time ESRS S1 S1-11 §74; §75; §AR 75
employees that are not provided to
temporary or part-time employees
(401-2-a-ii, a-iii, a-iv, a-v and b)
401-3 Parental leave ESRS S1 S1-15 §93 (1a) GRI 401-3 covers parental
(401-3-a and b) leave. ESRS S1-15 covers
family-related leave.
source: 04-02 draft ESRS-GRI Interoperability Index SR TEG meeting 5 December.txt
